points.title: A spark that stayed lit
points.text: Sherry Berry Lifestyle was born from an inner flame that refused to fade. Far from home and family, I learned that home can be a purpose as much as a place.
points.imageAlt: Candle flame symbolizing a new beginning

points.title: Candles as refuge
points.text: In every fragrance I found a piece of my roots and in every flame a symbol of hope. Lighting a candle became a sacred ritual and the spark that brought this brand to life.
points.imageAlt: Scented candle connecting back to my roots

points.title: Canada, where the light grew
points.text: Here I discovered the beauty of diversity and the magic of each season—the calm white of winter, autumn gold, summer's rebirth, and spring's promise. Canada gave me a new home and voice.
points.imageAlt: Candle glowing with a backdrop inspired by Canada

points.title: A purpose-driven brand
points.text: Sherry Berry Lifestyle reflects that journey: candles crafted with love, faith, and purpose to accompany your moments of reflection and remind you that light always returns.

points.title: Building with family
points.text: Alongside my husband and children, we keep lighting candles that warm both homes and hearts, because in a chaotic world sharing light and hope is an act of love.

points.title: More than candles
points.text: Sherry Berry Lifestyle is a symbol of resilience, gratitude, and belonging—an invitation to pause, breathe, and let your inner light turn any place into home.
points.imageAlt: Collection of candles representing resilience and gratitude
